eu.monnetproject.translation

Interface TranslationSourceFactory


  • public interface TranslationSourceFactory
    A factory for creating translation sources
    Author:
    John McCrae

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TranslationSource getSource(eu.monnetproject.lang.Language srcLang, eu.monnetproject.lang.Language trgLang)
      Create a translation source

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        TranslationSource getSource(eu.monnetproject.lang.Language srcLang,
                          eu.monnetproject.lang.Language trgLang)
        Create a translation source
        Parameters:
        srcLang - The source language for translation
        trgLang - The target language for translation
        Returns:
        The translation source or null if the source could not be created for these parameters
